item.title: AI Has Been Ruining Mankind Slowly
item.description: Just my 2 cents … Nowaday, it’s easy to see a news about AI (artificial intelligence) on the media. Even we are using it everyday without cognition. SO WHAT IS IT ? IS IT GOOD or BAD ? AND CAN WE … EAT IT ? In this article I will try to answer that questions : AI is just technology, so you can’t eat it ;) Technology is just a … technology, a thing that human created.
